00007 
00008 typedef struct _clocksource
00009 {
00010     t_object c_ob;
00011     method c_getticks;      // returns the current tick count
00012     method c_getstate;      // returns 0 if transport not going, 1 if going
00013     t_symbol *c_name;       // name
00014     long c_usedcount;       // number of transports using this clock source
00015 } t_clocksource;
00016     
00017 typedef t_object t_itm;
00018 
00019 void *itm_getglobal(void);

00023 void itm_dereference(t_itm *x);
